Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Pressure accumulator pre-charge loss. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Electromagnetic interference affecting sensor accuracy
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control Hydraulics component.
Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: F - Failure/ageing/Corrosion/Material Failure
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions.
Date: 17/12/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon
